Sentece: It is highly (96%) bound to plasma proteins and it is eliminated primarily by cytochrome P450 3A-mediated oxidation, with a half-life of about 7 hours in healthy volunteers.
Title: The clinical pharmacokinetics of the newer antiepileptic drugs. Focus on topiramate, zonisamide and tiagabine.
Name: Felbamate

Sentece: Single dose felbamate pharmacokinetic parameters differed between young and elderly subjects; compared with young subjects, elderly subjects had lower mean clearance (31.2 vs 25.1 ml min(-1); 90% CI -11.4 to -0.9; P = 0.02) and a trend towards a greater half-life (18.6 vs 21.0 h; 90% CI -0.6 to 5.4; P = 0.11).
Title: Single and multiple dose pharmacokinetics of felbamate in the elderly.

Sentece: Although its half-life is relatively short (6 to 8 hours), its duration of action is longer than anticipated from its pharmacokinetics in plasma, and a twice-daily dosing regimen is adequate to produce the desired response.
Title: The ideal pharmacokinetic properties of an antiepileptic drug: how close does levetiracetam come?
Name: Felbamate
